name: Copy Answers
description: EM to copy answer from one instrument to another in the same event.

project-settings.name: This EM will allow you to copy the answers from one instrument to another within the same event.

sub_settings.name:
Source Instrument
Select the source instrument that you want to copy answers from

Source Suffix
Define the suffix that will be remove from source instrument and its fields names to match the destination instrument and fields names

Destination Suffix
Define the suffix that will be added to destination instrument and fields names.

project-settings.name:
Enable Debug Logging
(optional) Requires installation and configuration of emLogger

system-settings.name: Enable Debug Logging (system-wide)(optional) Requires installation and configuration of emLogger
